title: Ep. 231 - One True Pairing by Cathy Yardley
itunes:title: Ep. 231 - One True Pairing by Cathy Yardley
description:
Hey HBs! https://sarawhitney.com/ (Sara Whitney) is here to geek out with Melody! We recap One True Pairing by Cathy Yardley and get to talk all about fandom, conventions, gothabilly style, and the Supernatural boys. There's grifting! It's SO FUN!! 
Check out Sara's latest book https://sarawhitney.com/tempting-fate/ (Tempting Fate). It's a swoony second chance romance with grumpy/sunshine, second chance romance, and only. one. TENT. Yes, you read that right. Sara dialed it up to 11 on this one! 
Lady Loves: 
Sara: friendships that nourish us. 
Melody: https://chicaloo.com/collections/heaving-bosom/products/heaving-bosoms-catchphrase-blank-5x7-notebook (Tiny notebooks)! ChicalooKate makes the cutest tiny notebooks, both fashioned after https://chicaloo.com/collections/heaving-bosom/products/heaving-bosoms-tits-out-blank-4x6-notepad (Heaving Bosoms) and https://chicaloo.com/collections/5x7-notebooks/products/caffeine-and-feminist-rage-5x7-notebook (not)! 
Make sure to check out Mel's new podcast https://bonkers-romance.captivate.fm/listen (Bonkers Romance)! 
Subscribe! Rate! Review! Tell all your friends :)
Get more content on https://www.patreon.com/heavingbosomspodcast (PATREON!!)
Sign up for our https://www.heavingbosoms.com/ (Newsletter)! 
MERCH! https://www.teepublic.com/stores/heaving-bosoms-podcast?ref_id=13852 (Teepublic), https://chicalookate.myshopify.com/collections/heaving-bosom (Chicaloo Kate), https://www.redbubble.com/people/heavingbosoms/shop?asc=u (Redbubble)
Make your life better and https://justasknat.com/ (hire Natalie) to assist you!!!
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/heavingbosoms/ (@heavingbosoms)
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Heaving_Bosoms (@heaving_bosom)s
Mentioned in this episode:
September in the Temple!
- This month we're back with Katee regaling us with more Fertile in My Ex-Boyfriend’s Dungeon (and we discover an actual hard limit for Katee!), and Hannah Whitten is going to stop by to give us all her best spooky season recs. 
- In Book Club news, everyone in the Joy Bringer and Celebrant tiers can download their ebooks of MY WICKED PRINCE by Molly O’Keefe and the entire audiobook collection of COURT OF THE VAMPIRE QUEEN by Katee Robert! 
- And finally, Joy Bringers and Celebrants can check out all the digital art we’ve created for the Temple! It’s all on one convenient page waiting for you. 
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/temple (Bonkers Temple of Defiant Joy! )
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)
content:encoded:
Hey HBs! Sara Whitney is here to geek out with Melody! We recap One True Pairing by Cathy Yardley and get to talk all about fandom, conventions, gothabilly style, and the Supernatural boys. There's grifting! It's SO FUN!!

Check out Sara's latest book Tempting Fate. It's a swoony second chance romance with grumpy/sunshine, second chance romance, and only. one. TENT. Yes, you read that right. Sara dialed it up to 11 on this one!

Lady Loves:

Sara: friendships that nourish us.

Melody: Tiny notebooks! ChicalooKate makes the cutest tiny notebooks, both fashioned after Heaving Bosoms and not!

Make sure to check out Mel's new podcast Bonkers Romance! 

Subscribe! Rate! Review! Tell all your friends :)

Get more content on PATREON!!

Sign up for our Newsletter! 

MERCH! Teepublic, Chicaloo Kate, Redbubble

Make your life better and hire Natalie to assist you!!!

Instagram: @heavingbosoms

Twitter: @heaving_bosoms

Mentioned in this episode:

September in the Temple!

- This month we're back with Katee regaling us with more Fertile in My Ex-Boyfriend’s Dungeon (and we discover an actual hard limit for Katee!), and Hannah Whitten is going to stop by to give us all her best spooky season recs. - In Book Club news, everyone in the Joy Bringer and Celebrant tiers can download their ebooks of MY WICKED PRINCE by Molly O’Keefe and the entire audiobook collection of COURT OF THE VAMPIRE QUEEN by Katee Robert! - And finally, Joy Bringers and Celebrants can check out all the digital art we’ve created for the Temple! It’s all on one convenient page waiting for you.

Bonkers Temple of Defiant Joy!

Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!

This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone. You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more! Tiers include: - Cinnamon Roll - $114.99 - The Alpha - - $169.99 Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022! If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.

Naima's Book Boyfriends
